description.zh-CN: 自然元素视觉效果家族，包含极光、波浪、粒子、液体和烟雾五种自然现象的动态模拟。通过 CSS 动画、SVG 路径和滤镜效果实现流动、飘渺、有机的视觉体验。
description.en-US: Nature-inspired visual effects family featuring aurora, waves, particles, liquid, and smoke simulations. Uses CSS animations, SVG paths, and filter effects to deliver flowing, ethereal, organic visuals.
